subject: Re: [junit] JUnit and Spring framework
msgSnippet: Hi all, Can JUnit be used for testing with Spring framework with hibernate? or do we require HttpUnit or JUnitEE for this? I am bit new to the testing
messageBody:
Hi all,
Can JUnit be used for testing with Spring framework with hibernate? or
do we require HttpUnit or JUnitEE for this?

I am bit new to the testing framework so apologies if i am talking stupid.

i have to test stored procedures called from hibernate persisters over
spring framework.

Let me know if anything else can be applied for unit testing this.

Thanks in advance for any tips.

Regards,

Balraj
